name: electron-break-timer
description: Electron app that runs in system tray and triggers breaks every 30 minutes

scripts.dev: tsc && npm run copy-overlay-assets && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron dist/main.js
scripts.copy-overlay-assets: powershell -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force dist/overlay/ui; Copy-Item src/overlay/ui/index.html dist/overlay/ui/; Copy-Item src/overlay/ui/styles.css dist/overlay/ui/; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force dist/settings/ui; Copy-Item src/settings/ui/index.html dist/settings/ui/; Copy-Item src/settings/ui/styles.css dist/settings/ui/"
scripts.package: npm run build && electron-packager . "The Way of Code - Break Timer" --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=dist-installer --overwrite --icon=assets/icons/thewayofcode.ico
scripts.zip: powershell "Compress-Archive -Path 'dist-installer\The Way of Code - Break Timer-win32-x64' -DestinationPath ('dist-installer\The Way of Code - Break Timer v' + $env:npm_package_version + '.zip') -Force"
scripts.dist: npm run package && npm run zip

build.productName: The Way of Code - Break Timer
